title: How to Run Scandisk on Windows 10

steps.title: Open File Explorer .
steps.content: Open File Explorer . You can press the keyboard shortcut Win + E or you can click the folder icon in your taskbar.

steps.title: Click This PC.
steps.content: Click This PC . It's in the panel on the left side of the window and will show you the drives on "This PC" on the right side of the window.

steps.title: Right-click the drive that you want to run ScanDisk on.
steps.content: Right-click the drive that you want to run ScanDisk on. A menu will pop up next to your cursor. You can't run ScanDisk on a folder, so you have to choose a drive that's listed under "Devices and drives.."

steps.title: Click Properties.
steps.content: Click Properties . Another window will open.

steps.title: Click the Tools tab.
steps.content: Click the Tools tab. It's near the top of the window.

steps.title: Click Check.
steps.content: Click Check . You'll see this in the "Error Checking" section next to an icon of a drive. Follow any on-screen instructions to continue, like allowing your computer to restart. [1] X Research source
